movies.title: Dark Fantasy
movies.plot: In Russia, the mystic student of linguistic Marina Leonova is in love with her boyfriend Artur. However, he blows her off and dates their schoolmate Vika. When their class travels to the countryside with their Professor Sergey Rudolfovich to research mystic spots, they meet a weird old lady in the forest and she invites them to have a meal with her. The outcast Marina stays by the lake and Artur seeks her to have sex. However they are surprised by their friends and the ashamed Marina runs to the forest. Kostya, who has a crush on Marina, follows her and they get lost in the woods. Marina and Kostya reach an abandoned house and Marina decides to explore the spot. She finds the mummified corpse of a witch holding a shield and she is possessed by a force and faints. Sergey and his students find her and he call a rescue team to help Marina. However, a violent elite squad in a helicopter arrives instead and sooner the students discover that the Minister of Mining Aleksandr is the son of ...

biography.bio: Svetlana Ivanova was born on September 26, 1985 in Moscow, RSFSR, USSR as Svetlana Andreevna Ivanova. She is an actress, known for Legend No. 17 (2013), War Zone (2012) and Franz + Polina (2006). She was previously married to Vyacheslav Lisnevskiy.
biography.name: Svetlana Ivanova

biography.bio: Ivan Zhidkov was born on August 28, 1983 in Sverdlovsk, RSFSR, USSR as Ivan Alekseevich Zhidkov. He is an actor, known for Chernaya Molniya (2009), Dark Fantasy (2010) and Ulybka Boga, ili Chisto odesskaya istoriya (2008). He has been married to Tatyana Arntgolts since December 2008. They have one child.
biography.name: Ivan Zhidkov

biography.placeOfBirth: Arkhangelsk, Arkhangelskaya oblast, RSFSR, USSR [now Russia]
biography.bio: Elena Panova was born on June 9, 1977 in Arkhangelsk, Arkhangelskaya oblast, RSFSR, USSR as Elena Viktorovna Panova. She is an actress, known for Revenge (2005), Berezina ou les derniers jours de la Suisse (1999) and Metro (2013).
biography.name: Elena Panova

biography.bio: Sergey Ugryumov was born on January 24, 1971 as Sergey Viktorovitch Ugryumov. He is an actor, known for Dark Fantasy (2010), Liquidation (2007) and Daddy (2004).
biography.name: Sergey Ugryumov

biography.bio: Ilya Alekseev is an actor, known for A zori zdes tikhie... (2015), Dark Fantasy (2010) and Tsvet plameni (2010).
biography.name: Ilya Alekseev

biography.bio: Evgeniy Atarik is an actor, known for Dark Fantasy (2010), Balabol (2014) and Deti beloy bogini (2009).
biography.name: Evgeniy Atarik

biography.bio: Olga Grishova is an actress, known for Dark Fantasy (2010) and Kulagin i partnyory (2004).
biography.name: Olga Grishova

biography.bio: Zakhar Khungureev is an actor, known for Svoy ostrov (2006), Dark Fantasy (2010) and Yunkera (2006).
biography.name: Zakhar Khungureev

biography.bio: Georgiy Klyuev is an actor, known for Dark Fantasy (2010) and Rzhevskiy protiv Napoleona (2012).
biography.name: Georgiy Klyuev

biography.bio: Mariya Kozhevnikova was born on November 14, 1984 in Moscow, RSFSR, USSR as Mariya Aleksandrovna Kozhevnikova. She is an actress, known for Univer (2008), Dukhless (2012) and Dhaam Dhoom (2008). She has been married to Eugeny Vasilyev since September 2013. They have two children.
biography.name: Mariya Kozhevnikova

biography.bio: Tatyana Kuznetsova was born on May 14, 1945 in Artyom, Russian SFSR, USSR as Tatyana Evgenievna Kuznetsova. She is an actress, known for Le barbier de Sibérie (1998), Drug moy, Kolka!.. (1961) and Marshrut postroen (2016).
biography.name: Tatyana Kuznetsova

biography.bio: Vladimir Malyugin is an actor, known for Dark Fantasy (2010).
biography.name: Vladimir Malyugin

biography.bio: Vladimir Nosik was born on April 3, 1948 in Moscow, RSFSR, USSR as Vladimir Benediktovich Nosik. He is an actor, known for Zvyozdnaya komandirovka (1983), I Promise! (1983) and What Senka Said (1986).
biography.name: Vladimir Nosik

biography.bio: Alina Orlova is a composer and actress, known for Star (2014), Za toboy (2011) and Dark Fantasy (2010).
biography.name: Alina Orlova

biography.bio: Kseniya Radchenko is an actress, known for Kino pro Alekseeva (2014), Kombinat 'Nadezhda' (2014) and Pikap: Sem bez pravil (2009).
biography.name: Kseniya Radchenko
